warning 1-1: Dont modify this file in anyway unless you really have to, this is where I put the tags that,
warning 1-2: I put this here in case someone wanted to change it.
warning 2-1: This is used find the Categorical Removals items to remove from the loot table along with the ignored NBT properties.
warning 2-2: while I some of them I use explicit checks so changing these might not have effects.
warning 2-3: checks like isEdible isArmor isSword from minecraft.
warning 3-1: you can modify this file for example if you wanted to ignore certain types while it might not work,
warning 4-1: Tags lists are forge tags, Tags_clean is what I use if the item somehow by passed forge tags as if they
warning 4-2: contain in the item name, you can remove them if you think they are unsafe.
warning 5-1: the NBT properties list is a set of common, non-special NBT keys that are often present on vanilla items,
warning 5-2: they will be ignored when determining if an item is *truly special*.
warning 6-1: these are for Tagged loots some loots are tags not items, they add loot using tags, some tables might contains these type of pools.
warning 6-2: more specific c:vegetables c:fruits c:helmets c:boots, for the rest I use the above tags, but food and armors I filtered differently.
